testcase.name: create_Post

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"author":"113","id":8,"title":"cqa"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("application/jsone", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
